hypothesis.name: Mid-Range Exploration
hypothesis.rationale: This point is chosen to explore a mid-range value for (x_0) and a high value for (x_1), which may correspond to a peak in the function's output.

hypothesis.name: Lower Bound Exploration
hypothesis.rationale: This point is selected to investigate the lower bounds of (x_0) and a moderate value for (x_1), potentially revealing different function behaviors.

hypothesis.name: Refined Exploration Near Peak
hypothesis.rationale: This point is chosen to further explore the promising region around the highest observed target value, maximizing the chances of finding the optimal settings.

hypothesis.name: Adjacent Exploration
hypothesis.rationale: This point is selected to investigate a nearby area to the previously identified peak, ensuring we capture any potential local maxima.

hypothesis.name: Exploration of New Peak
hypothesis.rationale: This point is chosen to explore a new area that has shown the highest target value, maximizing the chances of finding the optimal settings.

hypothesis.name: Extended Exploration
hypothesis.rationale: This point is selected to investigate a slightly extended area beyond the previously identified peaks, ensuring we capture any potential local maxima.

hypothesis.name: Focused Exploration Near Best Peak
hypothesis.rationale: This point is chosen to further explore the promising region around the highest observed target value, maximizing the chances of finding the optimal settings.

hypothesis.name: Broader Exploration
hypothesis.rationale: This point is selected to investigate a slightly broader area beyond the previously identified peaks, ensuring we capture any potential local maxima.

hypothesis.name: High x_0 Exploration
hypothesis.rationale: This point is chosen to explore the upper bound of x_0 while keeping x_1 moderate, potentially revealing new behaviors of the function.

hypothesis.name: Alternative High x_0 Exploration
hypothesis.rationale: This point is selected to investigate another high x_0 value with a different x_1 setting, ensuring we capture any potential maxima.

hypothesis.name: High x_0 with Moderate x_1
hypothesis.rationale: This point is chosen to explore the upper bound of x_0 while keeping x_1 moderate, potentially revealing new behaviors of the function.

hypothesis.name: Alternative High x_0 Exploration
hypothesis.rationale: This point is selected to investigate another high x_0 value with a different x_1 setting, ensuring we capture any potential maxima.
